item.title: Sessions Arts Club, London – Victorian Carol Singing Quartet
item.dc:creator: victoriancarols_wp
item.description: Thank you much for the amazing singers yesterday. They were wonderful! So professional, personable and sounded tremendous. We have received lovely feedback from the event – thank you!Wishing you a wonderful weekend x Best wishes,Karianne
item.content:encoded:
Thank you much for the amazing singers yesterday. 
They were wonderful! So professional, personable and sounded tremendous. We have received lovely feedback from the event – thank you!
Wishing you a wonderful weekend x

Best wishes,
Karianne

item.title: East India Club, London – Victorian Carol Singing Quartet
item.dc:creator: victoriancarols_wp
item.description: I just wanted to drop you a quick note to say thank you for last Wednesday evening. It was such a wonderful evening and we received lots of great feedback. Kind regards,Claire
item.content:encoded:
I just wanted to drop you a quick note to say thank you for last Wednesday evening. It was such a wonderful evening and we received lots of great feedback. 

Kind regards,
Claire

item.title: Virtual Christmas Party, Zoom, Carol Singing Trio
item.dc:creator: victoriancarols_wp
item.description: Just wanted to say a MASSIVE thank you for joining us last night for our virtual Christmas party!! You were all amazing and really added to the Christmas festivities. We hope you enjoyed your evening and had a giggle at the craziness?! Many thanks again for all your hard work (the mash ups still baffle … Continue reading "Virtual Christmas Party, Zoom, Carol Singing Trio"
item.content:encoded:
Just wanted to say a MASSIVE thank you for joining us last night for our virtual Christmas party!! You were all amazing and really added to the Christmas festivities.

We hope you enjoyed your evening and had a giggle at the craziness?!

Many thanks again for all your hard work (the mash ups still baffle me, you did such a good job)

Merry Christmas to you all!!
All the best,
Katie x

item.title: Corporate Christmas Drinks Reception, St Albans, Hertfordshire, Carol Singing Trio
item.dc:creator: victoriancarols_wp
item.description: “Thanks to you and the other singers for the lovely performance. As promised, here are some photos from last night (credit GK Studios).” Best – Kat, Debenhams Ottaway LLP
item.content:encoded: “Thanks to you and the other singers for the lovely performance. As promised, here are some photos from last night (credit GK Studios).” Best – Kat, Debenhams Ottaway LLP
